column1: The power is off for a long time and then 2 hours to repair it.
The power to shut down 2 hours and then to repair it.
Garbage truck does not come 3 days.
The power went out for 2 hours and then came back.
I do not have a car parked in front of the door.
Leaves from the house blown across.
Pot plant in front of the house.
